duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform audits of financial statements and prepare audit checklists under the supervision of accounting professionals.
Communicate with project in-charges and clients to engage and serve clients from various industries.
Develop technical accounting skills while working on a wide variety of audit engagements.
Prepare and organize workpapers for client files and adjust journal entries as needed.
Gain business writing experience while preparing financial statements alongside clients.
Travel to client sites as needed, including frequent same-day travel and occasional out-of-town travel.
Perform other essential duties as needed and work moderate overtime throughout the year with heavier overtime required during certain business cycles.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field. Masters preferred.
